title: radio connection
extract: Radio is the technology of using radio waves to carry information, such as sound and images, by systematically modulating properties of electromagnetic energy waves transmitted through space, such as their amplitude, frequency, phase, or pulse width. ... An antenna can be used for both transmitting and receiving.
